Package edu.psu.cse.siis.coal

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Internable<T>  
    PropagationSceneTransformerPrinter
    A printer for PropagationSceneTransformer.
    ResultBuilder
    A result builder interface.
    SymbolFilter
    A filter for symbols (variables).
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Analysis<A extends CommandLineArguments>
    The high-level pattern for the analysis, including the analysis setup, running the analysis and processing the results.
    AnalysisParameters
    Singleton with global analysis parameters.
    CallFlowFunctionFactory
    A factory for call flow functions.
    CallToReturnEdgeFunctionFactory
    A factory for call-to-return edge functions.
    CallToReturnFlowFunctionFactory
    A factory for call-to-return flow functions.
    CommandLineArguments
    The command line arguments for the analysis.
    CommandLineParser<A extends CommandLineArguments>
    An abstract parser for command line options.
    Constants
    Global constants.
    Constants.DefaultActions  
    Constants.DefaultArgumentTypes  
    DefaultAnalysis<A extends CommandLineArguments>
    A default analysis, which performs constant propagation with the default method argument analyses.
    DefaultCommandLineArguments  
    DefaultCommandLineParser  
    DefaultResult
    A default analysis result.
    DefaultResultBuilder
    A default result builder to record results after solving the IDE problem.
    DefaultResultProcessor  
    ExtendedSignature
    An extended signature, which consists in a method signature (name and argument types) and a superclass (fully qualified) name.
    FunctionFactoryUtils
    Utility functions for edge function and flow function factories.
    IterationSolver
    Singleton for managing iterations of the IDE analysis.
    Main  
    MethodDescription
    A method descriptor that includes the base class that declares this method and all the arguments of interest.
    Model
    Singleton that represents the COAL model for the analysis.
    ModelCompiler
    Compiler for COAL model.
    NormalEdgeFunctionFactory
    A factory for normal edge functions.
    NormalFlowFunctionFactory
    A factory for normal flow functions.
    Pool<T>  
    PropagationIcfg
    An interprocedural control flow graph where call graph edges to class initializers are included.
    PropagationLattice
    The lattice for the MVMF constant propagation problem.
    PropagationProblem
    Definition of the IDE problem for MVMF constant propagation.
    PropagationSceneTransformer
    The scene transformer for the propagation problem.
    PropagationSceneTransformerFilePrinter
    A PropagationSceneTransformerPrinter that prints to a file.
    PropagationSolver
    A solver for the MVMF constant propagation problem.
    PropagationTimers
    Timers and counters for the execution of the COAL solver.
    Result
    A constant propagation result.
    Results  
    ReturnFlowFunctionFactory
    A factory for return flow functions.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    AnalysisException
    A generic analysis exception.
    FatalAnalysisException
    A fatal analysis exception.
